gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Celtics 104, Pelicans 92
gameRecap.excerpt: The Celtics defeat the Pelicans, 104-92. Jayson Tatum led the Celtics with 23 points, nine rebounds and four assists, while Kristaps Porzingis added 19 points, 10 rebounds and four blocks in the victory.  Zion Williamson (25 points, nine rebounds, four assists) and CJ McCollum (24 points, five assists, four 3pt. FG) tallied a combined 49 points for the Pelicans in the losing effort.  The Celtics improve to 58-16 on the season, while the Pelicans fall to 45-29.
